code: import React from'react';import{Helmet}from'react-helmet-async';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SEO=_ref=>{let{title,description,image,url,type='website'}=_ref;const siteTitle='Fox Shrine VTuber';const defaultDescription='Join the Fox Shrine for games, laughs, and shrine fox adventures!';const defaultImage='https://foxshrinevtuber.com/social-card.jpg';const siteUrl='https://foxshrinevtuber.com';const seo={title:title?"".concat(title," | ").concat(siteTitle):siteTitle,description:description||defaultDescription,image:"".concat(image||defaultImage),url:"".concat(url||siteUrl)};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Helmet,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("title",{children:seo.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"description",content:seo.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"image",content:seo.image}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{property:"og:type",content:type}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{property:"og:url",content:seo.url}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{property:"og:title",content:seo.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{property:"og:description",content:seo.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{property:"og:image",content:seo.image}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"twitter:card",content:"summary_large_image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"twitter:url",content:seo.url}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"twitter:title",content:seo.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"twitter:description",content:seo.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"twitter:image",content:seo.image}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("link",{rel:"icon",href:"/favicon.ico"})]});};export default SEO;
